summary: The document is a classified communication detailing the investigation into the assassination of Martin Luther King, Jr., with a focus on the primary suspect, Eric Starvo Galt, who also used the aliases Harvey Lowmyer and John Willard. It provides a detailed physical description of Galt, notes his dangerous and armed nature, and seeks international cooperation to locate him. The document also discusses the distribution of Galt's photo to relevant parties and the importance of assessing the reliability of any information regarding his whereabouts.
key_findings: The document is part of the investigation into the assassination of Martin Luther King, Jr.
Eric Starvo Galt, with aliases Harvey Lowmyer and John Willard, is the primary suspect.
Detailed physical description and behavioral notes about Galt are provided.
International cooperation is sought to locate Galt, with a focus on evaluating the reliability of information.
The document underscores the dangerous nature of Galt, describing him as armed and extremely dangerous.
